765 pages 1991 by Fritz Springmeier


Political prisoner Fritz Springmeier delivers a great punch to the Jewish World establishment with this book which exposes the occultic-gnostic base of the Secret Societies that front for world Jewry. Be Wise As Serpents also looks in more detail into the Jewish Masonic roots of the Jehovah's Witness cult, also known as the Watchtower Bible and Tract Society. The founder of this cult was a Jewish Mason in the order of the Knights Templar.

Also included is an image of a watchtower magazine re-designed to show its true occult origins.

Be Wise as Serpents is the history of the systematic destruction of
Christianity and the building of a 1-world-religion. As you read this
research based on a. confidential interviews with participants within in the
conspiracy, b. interviews of unwitting participants within the conspiracy,
c. and historical documentation you will discover that there is great
evidence for a history we have not been told, and a great struggle before
mankind as the one-world-power/religion comes into focus.
